ja405:6.1: Appañhi etaṃ → appañca hetaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | appaṃsi etaṃ (mr)
ja405:6.3: sahassāni → sahassānaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed ^sn6.4#1 [4. Bakabrahmasutta]) | sahassāna (sya1ed, sya2ed, km)
ja405:11.2: Sambuddhimantaṃ → sambuddhivantaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sambuddhavantaṃ (mr), vatinaṃ → vati taṃ (sya1ed) | vatitaṃ (sya2ed) | vatidaṃ (mr)
